definition: Wenfeng district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
language/culture/writing/formal/literary/gentle/(old) classifier for coins/Kangxi radical 67
surname Wen
(of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
old variant of 峰[feng1]
Wenfeng district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
Wenfeng town (common place name)

sentences.english: Dear viewer friends, Daniel's gone to climb the pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 观众朋友们，大牛去爬文峰塔了。

sentences.english: But Wenfeng Pagoda was built in violation of that rule.
sentences.chinese: 可文峰塔偏偏违反了这个规律。

sentences.english: There is another unique aspect about Wenfeng Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 文峰塔还有一个独特之处。

sentences.english: Look, Daniel, that is Wenfeng Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 大牛你看，那就是文峰塔。

sentences.english: A small pagoda stands on top of Wenfeng Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 这文峰塔的塔顶是一座小塔。

sentences.english: Wenfengta leaps Mt. Longshan located at Ninghai County, was constructs at the end of the Ming dynasty brick tower.
sentences.chinese: 文峰塔位于宁海县跃龙山，是建于明末的砖塔。

sentences.english: Its top is thicker than its base.
sentences.chinese: 这文峰塔就是上面大，下面小。

sentences.english: Han Jia, the more I look at it, the more I like it.
sentences.chinese: 韩佳，这文峰塔我是越看越喜欢。

sentences.english: In all of China's ancient towers, Wenfeng tower is unique.
sentences.chinese: 文峰塔在中国古塔中是独一无二的。

sentences.english: It's another unique aspect of the pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 这台阶也是文峰塔的一个独特之处。

sentences.english: Han Jia, what place is this?
sentences.chinese: 这里是当地有名的文峰山。
